subject: RE: [junit] Need help on : API Testing using jUnit
msgSnippet: JUnit already is a framework for testing Java APIs.  All you have to do is write test cases in Java that exercise the API you want to test, and then use JUnit

JUnit already is a framework for testing Java APIs.  All you have to do
is =
write test cases in Java that exercise the API you want to test, and
then u=
se JUnit methods to check that the API returns what you expected.


Cheers,=

Todd.
